com.att.research.xacml.api.pep

Interface PEPEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StdEngine

    public interface PEPEngine
    PEPEngine is the interface that applications use to make policy queries against a XACML 3.0 policy engine.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    car

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Response decide(Request pepRequest)
      Instantiates a Policy Decision Point (PDP) to evaluate the given Request using its Policy Sets to determine if the given Request is allowed.

    • Method Detail

      • decide

        Response decide(Request pepRequest)
                throws PEPException
        Instantiates a Policy Decision Point (PDP) to evaluate the given Request using its Policy Sets to determine if the given Request is allowed.
        Parameters:
        pepRequest - the Request to evaluate
        Returns:
        a Response indicating the decision
        Throws:
        PEPException
